description: Name of the chromosome to be simulated
range_value: Defined by the user (must be character)

description: Whether phase 1 occur
Whether phase 2 populations are sampled from the same phase 1 population or from different phase 1 populations
Number of populations of phase 1 (must be the same as number of populations in phase 2)
Census population size of each population of phase 1 (must be even and space delimited)
Number of generations of phase 1
Whether dispersal occurs in phase 1
Type of dispersal in phase 1
Number of dispersing individuals in phase 1
Interval of number of generations in which dispersal occurs in phase 1
Coefficient that determines the variance in the number of offspring per mating for phase 1
Mean number offspring per mating for phase 1
Whether selection occurs in phase 1
Ne value to be used in the equation of rate of loss of heterozygosity for phase 1
Ne value to be used in the equation of the expected FST for phase 1
Number of populations of phase 2 (must be the same as number of populations in phase 1)
Census population size of each population of phase 2 (must be even and space delimited)
Number of generations of phase 2
Whether dispersal occurs in phase 2
Type of dispersal in phase 2
Number of dispersing individuals in phase 2
Interval of number of generations in which dispersal occurs in phase 2
Coefficient that determines the variance in the number of offspring per mating for phase 2
Mean number offspring per mating for phase 2
Whether selection occurs in phase 2
Ne value to be used in the equation of rate of loss of heterozygosity for phase 2
Ne value to be used in the equation of the expected FST for phase 2
Frequency of each one of the alleles of the loci from a real dataset
Should the census population size in the simulations be based on the genlight object? Odd population sizes are converted to even
Should the number of populations in the simulations be based on the genlight object?
Whether recombination occurs
Whether recombination occurs in males and females (or only females)
Approximation of the genetic load of the proportion of the genome that is simulated. This parameter is used in the absolute fitness model
Selection model to use
